mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE_NOTEPAD ( id, vcid, type, title, topicId, topicType, remark, catalogId, content, attributes, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateUserId, createDate, createUserId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{vcid}, #{type}, #{title}, #{topicId}, #{topicType}, #{remark}, #{catalog.id}, #{content}, #{attributes}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId} )
